author: Kate Morris and Sally Brown
method: Preheat the oven to  180C/350F/Gas 4. Put all of the ingredients and 125ml/4fl oz water into a small lidded ovenproof dish and mix until well combined.  Cover with the lid and bake in the oven for 30-40 minutes, or until the potatoes are cooked through.
ingredients: 2 spring onions, sliced,  ¼ fresh pepper, chopped,  50g/2oz French beans, trimmed,  4 baby sweetcorn,  4 baby new potatoes, quartered,  1 tsp madras curry paste,  100g/3½oz chopped tomatoes,  2-3 fresh cauliflower florets
